description: Jane is a computer programmer working at TechSolutions, currently following industry developments and maintaining personal notes about her company and broader tech topics.
relationship: Alex is a new acquaintance Jane met at the Global Tech Innovators Conference and with whom she exchanges emails about tech trends. Within TechSolutions, Jane works under executives CEO Mr. Thompson and CFO Ms. Rivera. She is also interested in events run by the Tech Enthusiasts Network, whose public talks and workshops she keeps track of.
